name: Dragon Epic Def
description:
Way back in ancient history, when humans and dragons live in peace, the human emperor once heard eating dragon eggs will make one live forever. Since then, the war between humans and dragons has begun.
You are the dragon warrior, son of dragon. Last hope to stop the greedy humans from stealing eggs and killing dragons.

Game Features:
- Enter the world of dragon.
- Discover new specialized power with over 18 abilities!
- Unleash the power of the elves with upgrading your castle.
- Master and upgrade more than 30 legendary bows and their awesome powers and spells!
- Immerse yourself in hours of gameplay with over 100 levels, for the newbies and veterans alike. Easy to play, hard to master.
- Using your Dragon Spells:
+ Fire Dragon: Special spell that damage an area by fire rain..
+ Ice Dragon: A spell that temporarily freeze all enemies.
+ Energy Dragon: Deal a shocking damage to enemies on a large area and make them slow.

Now! Command your dragons to stop greedy humans from stealing eggs now, OUR HERO!
